TriggerOraclev10g.name: IVR_COMM_MASTER_DET
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
tmpVar NUMBER;
/******************************************************************************
NAME:
PURPOSE:

REVISIONS:
Ver Date Author Description
--------- ---------- --------------- ------------------------------------
1.0 20/03/2007 1. Created this trigger.

NOTES:

Automatically available Auto Replace Keywords:
Object Name:
Sysdate: 20/03/2007
Date and Time: 20/03/2007, 02:20:02 ?, and 20/03/2007 02:20:02 ?
Username: (set in TOAD Options, Proc Templates)
Table Name: (set in the "New PL/SQL Object" dialog)
Trigger Options: (set in the "New PL/SQL Object" dialog)
******************************************************************************/
BEGIN
if inserting then
if :new.action_code in(6,64,67,68,69) then
update "OSD"."OSD_IVR"
set process_flag = 3,
department_no = :new.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
action_code = :new.action_code,
in_date = :new.in_date_yy||'/'||lpad(to_char(:new.in_date_mm),2,'0')||'/'||lpad(to_char(:new.in_date_dd),2,'0')
where process_no = :new.process_no
and process_year = :new.year;
else
update "OSD"."OSD_IVR"
set process_flag = 2,
department_no = :new.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
action_code = :new.action_code,
in_date = :new.in_date_yy||'/'||lpad(to_char(:new.in_date_mm),2,'0')||'/'||lpad(to_char(:new.in_date_dd),2,'0')
where process_no = :new.process_no
and process_year = :new.year;
end if;
/* elsif deleting then
delete "OSD"."OSD_IVR"
where process_no = :old.process_no
and process_year = :old.year;*/
end if;
END ;
